name: free-hearted1 poem
description:
Free-hearted person seeking other free-hearts who can appreciate this heartfelt poem. Easy to carry in purse or wallet. Trading card size 2.5" x 3.5".

Poem reads:
FREE-HEARTED1
An unselfish giver I love to be,
to help others who are in need.
Although I do not have alot to spare,
it makes me happy to be able to share my prayers, things, time and money all fulfill my secret passion of giving!
